name: ANTRUM (itch) (EPIC RAMEN 3D)
description:
ANTRUM is a game about ants collecting food.

Dig your way in a procedurally generated land, find food and bring it back to your nest before getting eaten by another creepy predatory insect. To do so, you can shoot mud in the face of your opponent, hide behind the dirt walls or call your ant teamates for help.

CONTROLS

Also, F toggles FULLSCREEN and ESC toggles PAUSE/QUIT

CREDITS

Programming, Art, Sound by EpicRamen3D

Note that some seeds may be better than others... If you get a sh*tty one, just restart from the main menu. Yeah sorry ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
